entry.title: p=4m+1
entry.content: 素数$\displaystyle p=4m+1$，$\displaystyle a|m$，证明$\displaystyle (\frac{a}{p})=1$ 1、 a为1，显然成立 2、 a为2，$\displaystyle p=8k+1$，$\displaystyle (\frac{2}{p})= 1$ 3、$\displaystyle m=\prod q_i$ 取一个奇素数q $\displaystyle p=4kq+1$ $\displaystyle \Rightarrow(p,q) = 1$ $\displaystyle \Rightarrow p \equiv 1(\mod q)$ 对$\displaystyle (\frac{q}{p})$有 $\displaystyle (\frac{q}{p})=(-1)^{\frac{p-1}{2}\frac{q-1}{2}}(\frac{q}{p})$ $\displaystyle \Rightarrow(\frac{q}{p})=(-1)^{m(q-1)}(\frac{1}{q})$ $\Rightarrow$ q是奇素数，$\displaystyle m(q-1)$是偶数 $\displaystyle \Rightarrow (\frac{q}{p})=1$ 由上述1、2、3得 $\displaystyle (\frac{a}{p})=(\frac{1}{p})^n(\frac{2}{p})^m\prod(\frac{q_i}{p})^l = 1$ n , m , l 为bool值，用于表达a的因数组成​ 至此证毕

entry.title: Hello Hexo
entry.content: Nice to meet you $f_{i} \leq f_{i-1} \times f_{i-2}$
